about_me: I am an 18 year old programmer interested technology. I like to try out new technologies and am not afraid to learn new things. Currently I work mainly on websites or similar, but I have also tried out other areas of software. I am also not afraid of hardware and therefore I have also tinkered there. For example, I built an 8-bit processor for my final thesis.
nowple: My final project in my informatics Course during the Kantonsschule Wattwil. This website is a simple dating website with a chat feature. The main selling point is the multitude of matching options.
troytd: A tower defence game. Based on the trojan war. Build with libGDX.
dos: Simple configurations and scripts for various linux distributions.
heebphotography: A website and desktop application for a young photographer. The website is mainly used to display his work and the desktop application is used for uploading the images and giving them a watermark.
christophbaertsch: A website for a young multimedia creator. Mainly used for uploading his work in photography, music and film production.
